statements: UPDATE CapitalStructureAnalysis SET debt_financing = 50000, equity_financing = 30000, total_capital = 80000 WHERE company_id = 1;
UPDATE CapitalStructureAnalysis SET equity_financing = 25000, debt_financing = 45000, total_capital = equity_financing + debt_financing WHERE company_id = 2;
UPDATE CapitalStructureAnalysis SET debt_financing = 50000.75, equity_financing = 75000.50 WHERE company_id = 1;
UPDATE CapitalStructureAnalysis SET total_capital = debt_financing + equity_financing WHERE company_id = 2;
UPDATE Debt_Financing SET debt_amount = 50000.00, interest_rate = 5.5 WHERE company_id = 123;
UPDATE Equity_Financing SET share_price = 10.25, equity_amount = 75000.00 WHERE company_id = 456;
UPDATE Debt_Financing SET debt_amount = 50000, interest_rate = 5.2 WHERE company_id = 123;
UPDATE Equity_Financing SET share_price = 10.5, shares_issued = 10000 WHERE company_id = 456;
UPDATE Debt_Financing SET debt_amount = 50000, debt_term = '3 years' WHERE debt_id = 1;
UPDATE Equity_Financing SET equity_share = 0.15, equity_amount = 75000 WHERE equity_id = 3;
UPDATE Debt_Financing SET debt_amount = 150000.50, debt_interest_rate = 6.5 WHERE debt_id = 101
UPDATE Equity_Financing SET investor_id = 201, equity_share = 0.15, equity_amount = 25000.75 WHERE equity_id = 201
UPDATE debt_financing SET debt_amount = 500000.00, company_name = 'ABC Company' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE debt_financing SET debt_amount = 50000.50, maturity_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE company_name = 'XYZ Corp';
UPDATE equity_financing SET issued_shares = 1000000, equity_amount = 750000.75 WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc';
UPDATE CapitalStructureData SET debt_amount = 50000.00, equity_amount = 75000.00 WHERE id = 1;
